str.txt: The essencial files to run Archimedes.
Basic operations features that allow the user to work the elements.
Lines features that allow creating lines in the drawing.
Curves features that allow creating arcs and circles in the drawing.
The text feature that allows to add text elements to the drawing and/or create elements that contain texts such as dimension.
The Spanish translation for the Archimedes core made by JosÃ© Fco. Soriano.
The French translation for the Archimedes core made by Hugo Corbucci.
The Portuguese(Brazil) translation for the Archimedes core made by Hugo Corbucci.
The Romanian translation for the Archimedes core made by Cristian Balan.
